mapper.insert: insert into base_user (id, login_name, `password`, locked, state_type, real_name, phone, sex, email, description, creater_id, creater_name, create_time, updater_id, updater_name, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{stateType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update base_user set login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, state_type = #{stateType,jdbcType=BIT}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updater_name = #{updaterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, login_name, `password`, locked, state_type, real_name, phone, sex, email, description, creater_id, creater_name, create_time, updater_id, updater_name, update_time from base_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, login_name, `password`, locked, state_type, real_name, phone, sex, email, description, creater_id, creater_name, create_time, updater_id, updater_name, update_time from base_user
